source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_SEQ_00<tab>Kabuto is more than ready to depart for Kugane.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_SEQ_00<tab>Kabuto est pressé de se mettre en route pour Kugane.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_SEQ_01<tab>With the matter of the Namazu's involvement settled─after a fashion─you and Kabuto set off for Kugane once again, knowing that you must make haste if you are to arrive before Nhaza'a Jaab. You opt to go directly to the meeting place at the Bokairo Inn, as J'olhmyn and M'zhet are likely to find their way back to the port city before you.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_SEQ_01<tab>Vous avez parlé à Kabuto. Rendez-vous à Kugane et attendez à l'endroit indiqué près de l'auberge du Bokairo pour retrouver J'olhmyn et M'zhet Tia.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_SEQ_02<tab>Upon your arrival, J'olhmyn informs you that she has already located Nhaza'a Jaab, who but recently came into port and boarded the imposing <var 1A 02 /var>Kuroboro Maru<var 1A 01 /var> along with his “cargo.” Soon after, M'zhet, who has been monitoring the harbor, contacts you by linkpearl, his rambling belying the urgency of the situation. It seems that Nhaza'a has already brought Alpa and Gyorei out on deck, presumably to be presented as the Three Wonders to his buyer─namely, the unscrupulous merchant Kageyama. The moment for action has come. Nhaza'a and Kageyama must be stopped before Alpa and Gyorei are relieved of flesh and fin.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_SEQ_02<tab>C'est J'olhmyn qui est venue vous accueillir à l'auberge du Bokairo. D'après elle, Nhaza'a Jaab a fait transporter Alpa et Gyorei à bord d'un imposant navire mouillant à la jetée n°1. Selon Kabuto, il s'agirait du Kuroboro Maru. Allez retrouver M'zhet Tia sur place.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_SEQ_03<tab>You and your companions rush aboard the <var 1A 02 /var>Kuroboro Maru<var 1A 01 /var>, arriving just in time for J'olhmyn to save Alpa from a grisly fate at the hands of Nhaza'a Jaab. Though an ungallant kick to the ribs sends J'olhmyn sprawling, the rest of your group rushes forward to continue the fight. This includes Gyoshin, who appears not a moment too soon, perched on an airborne mikoshi. Without preamble, he rams it into Kageyama, sending the villain─along with many a Namazu mikoshi bearer─flying. Meanwhile, Kabuto takes advantage of the confusion to slash at a distracted Nhaza'a, leaving him clutching a wound in his abdomen. Though the villain is still unwilling to surrender, the sound of the Sekiseigumi's whistle sends him loping to his skiff, hidden nearby as a means of escape. Though M'zhet's lobbed grenade fails to detonate, it is nevertheless successful in driving Nhaza'a off his boat and into the water, where he is dragged under by an unidentified finned creature. Kageyama's flight is more successful─he's halfway to Kogane Dori by the time you notice his departure. You, of course, give chase, Alpa and Kabuto in tow.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_SEQ_03<tab>Vous vous êtes <var 08 E905 ((hâtée)) ((hâté)) /var> à bord du Kuroboro Maru, où vous avez surpris Nhaza'a Jaab en train de remettre les trois “trésors” à Kageyama. Grâce à votre in<var 16 /var>ter<var 16 /var>ven<var 16 /var>tion éclair et à l'aide inespérée de Gyoshin, vous avez réussi à sauver Alpa et Gyorei, et Kabuto a récupéré son Tsukumo. Le perfide aventurier Miqo'te, quant à lui, a semble-t-il été dévoré par un énorme requin... Rendez-vous au niveau de l'aérodrome de Kugane afin d'observer les environs de Kogane-dori à l'endroit indiqué pour retrouver la trace de Kageyama.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_SEQ_04<tab>From a vantage point above Kogane Dori, you manage to catch sight of Kageyama. As you close in, he realizes that you are in pursuit, and hastily scatters a great deal of coin, causing nearby citizens to block your path as they scramble to lay hands on it. It immediately becomes clear, however, that he failed to account for the presence of a skilled Ananta goldsmith, as Alpa removes the distraction by shaping the money into a large ornament of the sort found atop Namazu mikoshi─dispersing the crowd as they realize with horror that their financial windfall is now an ichthyic monument of questionable monetary or artistic value. Though the thwarted Kageyama once again attempts to flee on foot, he runs right into Hancock and a pair of Sekiseigumi, and is summarily detained. Perhaps he will at last face justice for eschewing morality in the name of greed. Perhaps.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_SEQ_04<tab>Alors que Kageyama était sur le point de vous échapper une fois de plus, Hancock et des samouraïs du Sekiseigumi sont arrivés à point nommé pour le capturer. L'instigateur principal de cette sombre affaire mis hors d'état de nuire, vous avez bien mérité de prendre un peu de bon temps. Allez retrouver Alpa, à l'auberge du Bokairo.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_SEQ_05<tab>With the dastardly plot of Nhaza'a Jaab and Kageyama unraveled and the villains no longer a threat─at least for the time being─Alpa suggests that the whole group visit the Bokaisen Hot Springs to heal any lingering scrapes and bruises. As you enjoy the warm water and congenial chatter, you reflect on the many bonds forged this day. Indeed, such friendships may in time prove the greatest treasure of all.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_SEQ_05<tab>C'est en prenant un bon bain dans les sources d'eau chaude du Bokairo avec vos compagnons de fortune que vous avez partagé vos impressions sur cette affaire rocambolesque. Malgré les frayeurs causées par Nhaza'a Jaab, Kabuto, Alpa et Gyoshin étaient satisfaits que cette épreuve leur ait permis de se rencontrer. Dorénavant, ils comptent bien entretenir les liens naissants entre les Kojin, les Anantas et les Namazu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_TODO_00<tab>Wait for J'olhmyn at the meeting spot near the Bokairo Inn.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_TODO_00<tab>Attendre à l'endroit indiqué, à l'auberge du Bokairo

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_TODO_01<tab>Speak with M'zhet Tia at the harbor.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_TODO_01<tab>Parler à M'zhet Tia

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_TODO_02<tab>Survey Kogane Dori from above.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_TODO_02<tab>Observer les environs à l'endroit indiqué

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Alpa near the Bokairo Inn.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_TODO_03<tab>Parler à Alpa

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_001<tab>It might serve us to have a clearer idea of Seigetsu the Enlightened's plan, but we can wait no longer to depart. Come, we should hasten to the Bokairo Inn.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_001<tab>Ne perdons pas plus de temps et allons retrouver J'olhmyn et M'zhet Tia à l'auberge du Bokairoooo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_GYOSHIN_000_005<tab>Maybe I should pack <var 1A 02 /var>two<var 1A 01 /var> hammers after all. Yes, yes...
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_GYOSHIN_000_005<tab>Partez devant, je vous rejoindrai dès que j'aurai fini de me préparer avec Seigetsu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_010<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_010<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_050<tab>You two made good time! We left for Kugane just after I spoke with you, and only arrived a short while ago ourselves.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_050<tab>Vous voilà<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_051<tab>Have you been able to learn anything of Nhaza'a?
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_051<tab>J'olhmyn, pouvez-vous nous mettre au courant des dernières avancéééées<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_052<tab>We were successful in returning to Kugane ahead of him, though not by much. He's already made port.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_052<tab>Après notre dernière con<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion via linkperrrle, nous sommes rentrés en vitesse à Kugane et comme nous l'espérions, nous avons devancé Nhaza'a.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_053<tab>We saw dockworkers hauling a large barrel and squirming sack from his skiff─under his close watch, unfortunately─so whatever his plans are, they're likely already in motion.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_053<tab>Il est arrivé sur une petite barque de laquelle nous l'avons vu décharger un tonneau et un grrros sac de jute.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_054<tab>The prisoners! Where has he sent them?
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_054<tab>Le tonneau, c'est celui dans lequel il a enfermé Gyoreiiii. Dans ce cas, le sac de juuuute...

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_055<tab>There's a large vessel docked at Pier #1─it seems Alpa and Gyorei have been taken aboard. I have M'zhet keeping an eye on the situation.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_055<tab>Oui, c'était sûrrrement Alpa. Nous savons qu'il les a ensuite fait transporter à bord d'un gros navire de commerce qui mouille du côté de la jetée n°1.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_056<tab>I saw that ship when we arrived. It's unmistakably the <var 1A 02 /var>Kuroboro Maru<var 1A 01 /var>. If I recall correctly, the merchant Kageyama purchased it for a hefty sum some time ago.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_056<tab>C'est cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment le Kuroboro Maruuuu<var 1D /var>! Les Kuganiens en ont beaucoup parlé lorsqu'il a été racheté par Kageyama, un marchand tristement célèbre dans la régioooon.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_057<tab>Kageyama, you say? And who might that be?
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_057<tab>Qu'est-ce qui a valu sa sinistrrre réputation à ce Kageyama<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_058<tab>A man easily as vile as Nhaza'a Jaab himself. He once conspired to take Kugane Castle, holding the bugyo hostage as he made ludicrous demands. Though thwarted, he used his wealth and influence to escape justice.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_058<tab>C'est un marchand véreux qui a fomenté la prise du Château de Kugane à la tête d'un groupe d'isolationniiiistes. Il a toujours clamé avoir été victime d'un coup monté et sans son énorme fortune, il croupirait encore en prisoooon.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_059<tab>I am not familiar with the details, but according to rumor, he has a history of using wealth to make each and every one of his problems disappear.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_059<tab>Je ne connais pas les détails, mais j'ai entendu dire que c'était un marchand véreux qui résolvait tous ses problèmes à coups de giiiils...

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_060<tab>He has taken to using this tactic recently, it is said, in pursuit of a bride, spending more gil than most will ever see in his attempt to snare the perfect woman.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_060<tab>Si sa fortune est aussi immense qu'on le dit, cela ne doit pas être un problème pour luiiii. Il paraît qu'il en consacre la plus grande partie aux feeeemmes... Toujours célibataire, il est désespérement à la recherche de celle qui acceptera de l'épouseeeer.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_061<tab>A bride, hmm? Well, I think we've found Nhaza'a Jaab's esteemed employer.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_061<tab>Un riche homme d'affaires prrrêt à tout pour se marier<var 1D /var>!? Et si ce Kageyama s'était attaché les services de Nhaza'a pour obtenir les trois trésors et demander sa main à la jeune fille noble<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_062<tab>(-M'zhet-)Hello, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? It is I! You know─your favorite Miqo'te? Dashing good looks, ladies' man, future nunh of the M tribe?
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_062<tab>(-Voix de M'zhet Tia-)Maître, c'est moi<var 1D /var>! M'zhet Tia, futur Nunh de la tribu des M et bientôt entourrré de femmes prêtes à répondre au moindre de mes désirrrs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_063<tab>(-M'zhet-)Yes, well, I'm afraid that we have a problem. One that requires your immediate attention─that's why I contacted you. It's vital that you hear this as soon as possible.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_063<tab>(-Voix de M'zhet Tia-)Mais qu'est-ce que je raconte, moi<var 1D /var>!? L'heure est grrrave<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_064<tab>(-M'zhet-)I've been dutifully keeping watch by the <var 1A 02 /var>Kuroboro Maru<var 1A 01 /var>, and Alpa and the Namazu have just been brought out on deck. We don't have much longer until our “mermaid” becomes “mermaid's flesh”!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_064<tab>(-Voix de M'zhet Tia-)Alors que je montais la garde devant le Kuroboro Maru comme J'olhmyn me l'avait demandé, j'ai vu Nhaza'a emmener de forrrce Alpa et une Namazu sur le pont du bateau.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_065<tab>(-M'zhet-)I would love to continue this little chat we're having, but I rather think you should come to the harbor right away!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_065<tab>(-Voix de M'zhet Tia-)Si on ne fait rien, notre capitaine va vérrritablement finir en chair de sirène<var 1D /var>! Venez vite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_066<tab>Was that M'zhet?
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_066<tab>C'était M'zhet<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_067<tab>This is our last chance, then. We must stop Nhaza'a once and for all!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_067<tab>Quooooi<var 1D /var>!? Il n'y a pas une seconde à peeeerdre<var 1D /var>! Allons vite le rejoindre près du Kuroboro Maruuuu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_070<tab>The others should have arrived before we did. I assume that they have occupied themselves by gathering information throughout the city in the meantime.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_070<tab>Attendons J'olhmyn ici, elle ne devrait pas tardeeeer.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_100_100<tab>There you are! We must hurry!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_100_100<tab>Maître<var 1D /var>! Merrrci d'avoir fait si vite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_200_100<tab>Alpa is a dear friend, and I won't have her turned into mince by some scheming─and rather unattractive, I must say─villain!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_200_100<tab>Alpa représente tant pour moi... Il est horrrs de question que je l'abandonne à la merci d'un pervers dégoûtant<var 1D /var>! Dès que J'olhmyn et Kabuto seront là, nous allons nous occuper de son cas.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KAGEYAMA_000_100<tab>Merflesh...
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KAGEYAMA_000_100<tab>De la chair de sirène...

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KAGEYAMA_000_101<tab>The Philosopher's Fin...
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KAGEYAMA_000_101<tab>... une nageoire de sage...

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KAGEYAMA_000_102<tab>And the Jewel of Fair Souls.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KAGEYAMA_000_102<tab>... et un joyau habité.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KAGEYAMA_000_103<tab>With this, she can no longer deny me! And what a pretty thing she will be, beside me at our matrimonial feast. I can taste it now...
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KAGEYAMA_000_103<tab>Avec ça, je vais enfin pouvoir demander ma princesse en mariage<var 1D /var>! Rien que de m'imaginer en train d'apprécier les plaisirs de la vie avec elle, j'en ai l'eau à la bouche. Hmmm...

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_NHAZAAJAAB_000_104<tab>I couldn't possibly care less about what you intend to do with the goods, so long as I am fairly compensated. And speaking of payment, I think it's time that we finish up here.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_NHAZAAJAAB_000_104<tab>Si c'est le genre de chose qui te mène à l'exaltation, tant mieux pour toi... mais merrrci de m'épargner les détails.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_NHAZAAJAAB_100_104<tab>I need only carve the meat...
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_NHAZAAJAAB_100_104<tab>Bon, je n'ai plus qu'à découper un peu de viande surrr celle-là et c'est mission accomplie...

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_105<tab>Not a chance!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_105<tab>Il faudra d'abord me passer sur le corrrps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_NHAZAAJAAB_000_106<tab>Finally caught up, have you? Though I doubt you have much more to offer this time around!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_NHAZAAJAAB_000_106<tab>Enfin, te voilà<var 1D /var>! Voyons voir si tu arrives à me prrrocurer un peu d'exaltation, pour une fois<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_107<tab>J'olhmyn!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_107<tab>J'olhmyn<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_108<tab>That was dirty! What, afraid you couldn't defeat her in a fair fight?
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_108<tab>Espèce de...

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_NHAZAAJAAB_000_109<tab>I merely prefer to spend my time on foes that are actually worthy─or at least suitably entertaining. But if any of you believe you will present a greater challenge, then by all means...
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_NHAZAAJAAB_000_109<tab>Hé hé hé... Approchez, n'ayez pas peurrr<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_110<tab>Very well. I will defeat you myself, and have you return Tsukumo here and now.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_110<tab>Rends-moi Tsukumo immédiatemeeeent<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_GYOSHIN_000_111<tab>(-???-)I see them! They are most visible!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_GYOSHIN_000_111<tab>(-???-)Je vous trouve enfin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_GYOSHIN_000_112<tab>Ramming speed, yes, yeeeeees!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_GYOSHIN_000_112<tab>Oh hisse<var 1D /var>! Compagnons, à l'attaaaque<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_NHAZAAJAAB_000_113<tab>Hurk!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_NHAZAAJAAB_000_113<tab>Aaaaah<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KAGEYAMA_000_114<tab>That whistle─it's the Sekiseigumi!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KAGEYAMA_000_114<tab>Le Sekiseigumi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_NHAZAAJAAB_000_115<tab>Pity. I was just beginning to feel a twinge of excitement, but I see I must take my leave.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_NHAZAAJAAB_000_115<tab>Tsk, des gêneurs... Heurrreusement, j'avais tout prévu.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_NHAZAAJAAB_000_116<tab>Ahahahahaha! Farewell, Eastern beastmen! This little chase has been <var 1A 02 /var>most<var 1A 01 /var> amusing. Perhaps you may entertain me again someday.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_NHAZAAJAAB_000_116<tab>Ha ha ha, ces hommes-bêtes sont tellement <var 1A 02 /var>divertissants<var 1A 01 /var>, à défaut d'être exaltants<var 1D /var>! Ne vous en faites pas, on se retrrrouvera<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_117<tab>Not this time... As the future nunh, and a friend to J'olhmyn and Alpa both, I cannot let these crimes go unanswered!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_117<tab>Tu crois que tu vas t'en tirrrer si facilement après ce que tu as fait à J'olhmyn<var 1D /var>? Je ne le permettrai pas<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_118Trust me, sometimes you have to learn the hard way...
How to treat a lady!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_118<tab>Voilà qui t'apprendra à trrraiter une demoiselle con<var 16 /var>ve<var 16 /var>na<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_NHAZAAJAAB_000_119<tab>Seven hells!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_NHAZAAJAAB_000_119<tab>Hein<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_120<tab>Oh, <var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var> we find the one with no powder.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_120<tab>... La poudre a été retirrrée<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_100_120<tab>Gwahahahahahaha! So much for your parlor trick!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_100_120<tab>Ha ha ha<var 1D /var>! On dirrrait que ton plan est tombé à l'eau<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_121<tab>Gwahahahahahaha! As if explosives would save the adventurer's gaggle of misfits <var 1A 02 /var>yet again<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_121<tab>Je goûte l'exaltation, mais beaucoup moins les explosions... J'ai déjà donné, et ça m'a bien suffi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_121<tab>Now we only need ensure that Kageyama meets with justice at the hands of the Sekiseigumi.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_121<tab>Voilà un voyou de puni, au tour de son compliiiice. Rattrapons ce pervers de Kageyama et laissons-le s'expliquer avec le Sekiseigumiiii<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_122<tab>That...may pose a problem. Where has that eel slipped off to?
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_122<tab>Au fait, où est-il passé<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_123<tab>He makes for Kogane Dori! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, with me!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_123<tab>On dirait qu'il s'enfuit vers Kogane-doriiii<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, suivons-leeee<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_124<tab>We can meet at the Bokairo Inn afterward─I will carry the wounded there. We're counting on you!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_124<tab>Maître, je compte sur vous<var 1D /var>! Je vais rester ici pour m'occuper des blessés. Retrouvons-nous à l'auberge du Bokairo lorsque vous en aurrrez terminé, d'accord<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_SYSTEM_100_150<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_SYSTEM_100_150<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_150<tab>You need not push yourself, Alpa. You have only just been freed from what must have been a very trying ordeal.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_150<tab>N'en faites pas trop, Alpaaaa<var 1D /var>! Vous avez passé un bon bout de temps ligotée, vous devez encore être toute engourdiiiie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_ALPA_000_151<tab>I'll be fine. As captain of the Velodyna Gatekeepers, I can't let evil go unpunished!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_ALPA_000_151<tab>Ne vous en faites pas pour moi. En tant que capitaine des garde-frontières de la Velodyna, j'en ai vu d'autres<var 1D /var>! Ssss<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_152<tab>There!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_152<tab>Regardez, là-baaaas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KAGEYAMA_000_153<tab>What? How did you─ Well, no matter. You may have followed me this far, but no further!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KAGEYAMA_000_153<tab>Q-quoi<var 1D /var>!? Ne me dites pas qu'ils m'ont suivi<var 1D /var>! Voyons voir ce qu'ils vont dire de <var 1A 02 /var>ça<var 1A 01 /var>...

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KAGEYAMA_000_154<tab>Paupers of Kugane! Behold my loose change!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KAGEYAMA_000_154<tab>Hé, les miséreux<var 1D /var>! Regardez un peu par ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_PASSERBYA03164_000_155<tab>(-Eager Townsperson-)Oooh, free money!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_PASSERBYA03164_000_155<tab>(-Passants excités-)Ooooh<var 1D /var>! Il pleut de l'argent<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_156<tab>Pardon me, sir, but if you could move a bit to the left... Ma'am, it is imperative that we capture this villain... <sigh> They're not listening.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_156<tab>Laissez-nous passer ou ce criminel va s'échappeeeer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KAGEYAMA_000_157<tab>Hahaha! Just look at them, scrounging at my feet! It pays to be wealthy!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KAGEYAMA_000_157<tab>Ils ne vous entendent même pas... Vous ne pouvez rien contre le pouvoir de l'argent, ha ha ha<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_ALPA_000_158<tab>Please, leave thisss to me.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_ALPA_000_158<tab>Puisque c'est comme ça... Ssss...

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KAGEYAMA_000_159<tab>You're wasting your time, little mermaid! I'm a master of monetary manipulation, and no one is easier to control than coin-starved commoners!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KAGEYAMA_000_159<tab>Qu'est-ce que tu comptes faire<var 1D /var>!? Tu perds ton temps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KAGEYAMA_000_160<tab>What is the meaning of this!?
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KAGEYAMA_000_160<tab>Hein<var 1D /var>!? Quelle est cette sorcellerie<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_PASSERBYA03164_000_161<tab>(-Disappointed Townsperson-)Oh, cruel fate, why do you mock me?
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_PASSERBYA03164_000_161<tab>(-Passants désabusés-)Oh non<var 1D /var>! Où est passé l'argent<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_162<tab>Well done. But why a fish?
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_162<tab>... Au fait, pourquoi un Namazuuuu<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_ALPA_000_163<tab>I saw one on the Namazu's strange contraption earlier. It was so cute, I just couldn't stop thinking about it.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_ALPA_000_163<tab>Je ne sais pas, l'arrivée de Gyoshin sur son drôle d'engin un peu plus tôt a dû me marquer... Ssss...

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_PASSERBYB03164_000_164<tab>(-Disappointed Townsperson-)I don't even <var 1A 02 /var>like<var 1A 01 /var> fish.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_PASSERBYB03164_000_164<tab>(-Passants désabusés-)Pfff, quelle perte de temps... Allez, on rentre.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_165<tab>I believe it's time that you accepted your fate.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_165<tab>C'est le moment de payer pour tes méfaits, Kageyamaaaa.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_HANCOCK_000_166<tab>Yes, I think that's quite enough escape attempts for one day. You've made it perfectly clear who the villain here is. Right, my Sekiseigumi friends?
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_HANCOCK_000_166<tab>Je commence à en avoir marre de courir à travers les rues de la ville... Messieurs du Sekiseigumi, vous savez ce qu'il vous reste à faire, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KAGEYAMA_000_167<tab>You can't do this to me! I have a woman to coerce! A matrimonial banquet to consume!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KAGEYAMA_000_167<tab>N-non... Alors que j'étais si prêt du but, d'une vie de rêve avec ma princesse... Nooooooon<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_168<tab>It seems that the matter is resolved at last. Shall we go and inform the others?
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_168<tab>Je suis content de savoir que cet affreux personnage va retrouver la place qu'il mérite<var 1D /var>: derrière les barreaux d'une prisoooon<var 1D /var>! Allons apprendre la bonne nouvelle à nos amis qui nous attendent à l'auberge du Bokairoooo.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_YAMABIKO_000_170<tab>That was quite the ruckus earlier. And where did all the Namazu come from?
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_YAMABIKO_000_170<tab>Y a eu un sacré raffut tantôt, du coté du Kuroboro Maru<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_175<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_175<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_ALPA_000_200<tab>The innkeep was kind enough to call a doctor, but it ssseems that no one has more than minor injuries.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_ALPA_000_200<tab>D'après le médecin que le pro<var 16 /var>prié<var 16 /var>taire du Bokairo a eu la gentillesse de faire venir, tout le monde devrait s'en tirer avec de simples égra<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>gnu<var 16 /var>res. Ssss...

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_ALPA_000_201<tab>And apparently, there's no better treatment for scrapes and bruises than the Bokaisen Hot Springs! I guess we'll just have to visit them again!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_ALPA_000_201<tab>Au fait, il paraît que les propriétés curatives des sources locales ont depuis longtemps fait leurs preuves<var 1D /var>! Que diriez-vous de prendre un bon bain, tous ensemble<var 1D /var>? Ssss...

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_Q1_000_000<tab>Enter the hot springs in your current garb?
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_Q1_000_000<tab>Entrer dans le bain sans vous changer<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_ALPA_000_203<tab>Let's continue where we left off before we were so rudely interrupted, shall we?
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_ALPA_000_203<tab>Aaaah, un bon bain<var 1D /var>! Ça va nous faire un bien fou<var 1D /var>! Ssss...

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_204<tab>I'm so sorry, Alpa.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_204<tab>Alpa, je suis vrrraiment désolée pour tout ce qui est arrivé...

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_ALPA_000_205<tab>What? You have absolutely nothing to apologize for! Not now, not ever!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_ALPA_000_205<tab>Je crois bien que c'est la première fois que tu emploies un ton pareil avec moi... Ne t'en fais pas, voyons, tu n'y es pour rien<var 1D /var>! Ssss...

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_206<tab>It's my duty to protect you, and I failed utterly. Then it took so long to free you...and I couldn't even manage that without help.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_206<tab>Je suis censée te protéger, et pourtant je n'ai absolument rrrien pu faire lorsque Nhaza'a t'a enlevée. J'ai piteusement échoué dans ma seule mission...

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_ALPA_000_207<tab>Maybe not, but the rescue wouldn't have succeeded without your leadership─not to mention how you saved me from being sliced in two. You may not be able to do everything yourself, but I couldn't ask for a better sssecond-in-command.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_ALPA_000_207<tab>Mais tu as remué ciel et terre pour me retrouver, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? Je sais que je peux toujours compter sur toi, et c'est ce qu'il y a de plus important. Tu dois avoir confiance en toi<var 1D /var>! Ssss...

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_208<tab>Alpa, I... Thank you.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_208<tab>Alpa...

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_ALPA_000_209<tab>I'm grateful to everyone else too, of course. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Kabuto, Gyoshin, M'zh─
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_ALPA_000_209<tab>À vrai dire, c'est vous tous que je dois remercier. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Kabuto, Gyoshin et M'zhet Tia... Sans vous, je ne serais plus de ce monde. Ssss...

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_ALPA_100_209<tab>Hold on, where's M'zhet?
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_ALPA_100_209<tab>Tiens, où est passé M'zhet<var 1D /var>? Ssss...

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_200_209<tab>Maybe he's still changing?
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_200_209<tab>Il est peut-être reparrrti se changer<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_210<tab>Augh!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_210<tab>KYAAAAAAH<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_211<tab>Never fear, it is I, M'zhet! I discovered this floating in the sea after Nhaza'a disappeared. How do I look? Rakish?
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_MZHETTIA_000_211<tab>C'est moi, enfin<var 1D /var>! J'ai récupéré le drôle de masque de Nhaza'a, lorsqu'il a coulé à pic. Tu trrrouves qu'il me va bien<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_212<tab>I'm throwing that back in the sea, and you along with it!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_212<tab>Espèce de... Tu verras s'il te va bien une fois que je te l'aurrrai fait mangeeer<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_100_212<tab>Just when you think he's learned something...
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_100_212<tab>Moi qui pensais qu'il était devenu plus sérrrieux et avait enfin décidé de faire face à ses res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>tés... Décidément, il ne changerrra jamais<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_213<tab>If I may ask, Gyoshin, how did you know to find us on the <var 1A 02 /var>Kuroboro Maru<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_213<tab>Au fait, Gyoshiiiin. Comment as-tu su que nous étions à bord du Kuroboro Maruuuu<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_GYOSHIN_000_214<tab>It was easy to spot you from above! I knew that stuffing the mikoshi with all of the cloudsbreath in our stores was the right choice, yes, yes.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_GYOSHIN_000_214<tab>Mais c'est très simple<var 1D /var>! Nous vous avons aperçus en survolant Kugane<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_215<tab>My, how convenient. And I'm glad that you made it out safely too, Gyorei.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_JOLHMYN_000_215<tab>Votre petite machine volante a l'air trrrès spéciale. J'aurais aimé pouvoir admirer votre entrée en scène de mes propres yeux<var 1D /var>! Mais le principal, c'est que Gyorei soit saine et sauve.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_GYOREI_000_216<tab>Thanks to all of you! Being trapped in a barrel was harrowing, and fraught with splintery peril, yes, yes. But it was worth it for a chance to enjoy these hot springs together!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_GYOREI_000_216<tab>Je vous suis tellement re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sante<var 1D /var>! J'ai eu la peur de ma vie, mais maintenant que je prends un bain salvateur en votre compagnie, je me dis que ça valait le coup<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_217<tab>...If you say so.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_217<tab>C'est ce qu'on appelle se sentir comme un poisson dans l'eau, hé héééé.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_GYOSHIN_000_218<tab>What is that gem in your helmet? It is most unusual. Quite unique!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_GYOSHIN_000_218<tab>Dites, Kabuto. Quelle est cette magnifique pierre précieuse qui orne votre casque<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_219<tab>This is the soul of my dear friend Tsukumo, more valuable than any treasure in the whole of the Ruby Sea.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_219<tab>C'est le joyau habité par Tsukumo que Nhaza'a Jaab m'avait dérobéééé. J'y tiens beaucoup, et il a pour moi plus de valeur que tous les trésors du moooonde.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_220<tab>He is what Nhaza'a stole from me, and I am truly grateful to you for helping me retrieve him.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_220<tab>Ça a été très dur d'en être séparéééé... Grâce à votre aide, nous sommes à nouveau réunis, et je ne me suis jamais porté aussi bieeeen<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_221<tab>As Gyorei said, despite our tribulations, I feel fortunate to have met you all. I hope that we can continue to strengthen our friendship now that we're all safe and sound.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_221<tab>Nhaza'a Jaab nous a fait beaucoup de mal, mais il nous a aussi permis de nous rencontreeeer. Puisque nous venons tous d'horizons bien différents, je suis convaincu que nous avons beaucoup à apprendre les uns des aaaautres.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_GYOSHIN_000_222<tab>Then please come to our festival, yes, yes! We can strengthen our friendship and all of our assorted limbs by carrying a mikoshi together!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_GYOSHIN_000_222<tab>Vous avez raison<var 1D /var>! Dorénavant, si nous avons l'honneur de recevoir des visiteurs kojin ou anantas lors de nos festivals, nous les accueillerons comme il se doit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_ALPA_000_223<tab>And if you're ever in Eorzea, come to Ala Mhigo! The Velodyna Gatekeepers will give you the grand tour, and you can stay at the cassstellum...
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_ALPA_000_223<tab>S'il vous arrive de voyager en Éorzéa, n'hésitez pas à passer par Ala Mhigo. Nous autres garde-frontières de la Velodyna ferons tout notre possible pour que vous profitiez à fond de votre séjour<var 1D /var>! Ssss...

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_SYSTEM_000_250<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Allied<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with the Kojin, the Vira, and the Namazu.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_SYSTEM_000_250<tab>Vous êtes à présent <var 08 E905 ((une amie précieuse)) ((un ami précieux)) /var> des Kojin, des Anantas et des Namazu. Vous avez atteint le rang “Allié” avec ces trois races d'hommes-bêtes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_SYSTEM_000_251<tab>Furthermore, you now have access to a wider selection of wares from Shikitahe, Madhura, and Gyosho.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_SYSTEM_000_251<tab>Les vendeurs des trois races, Shikitahe, Madhura et Gyosho, vous proposent maintenant les objets correspondant au rang “Allié”.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_SYSTEM_000_252<tab>You have learned the emote <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Gratuity<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_SYSTEM_000_252<tab>Vous avez appris l'emote <var 1A 02 /var>Charité chafouine<var 1A 01 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_SYSTEM_000_253<tab>Through your efforts, the most prominent beast tribes of Ala Mhigo and the Far East have forged bonds of friendship that promise to remain strong through the years. You are a hero to beastmen across many realms!
target:
TEXT_BANALL240_03164_SYSTEM_000_253Grâce à vous, les quatre principaux peuples vivant à Ala Mhigo et en Orient ont réussi à atteindre un meilleur niveau d'entente et pourront peut-être tisser des liens plus profonds à l'avenir.
Merci d'avoir persévéré par le biais des quêtes quotidiennes.

source: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_225<tab>I paid visit to Shihoumi. Thankfully, she was able to place Tsukumo back where he belongs.
target: TEXT_BANALL240_03164_KABUTO_000_225<tab>J'ai rendu une visite éclair à Shihoumi pour qu'elle fixe de nouveau Tsukumo sur mon caaaasque. Sans lui, je me sentais tout nuuuu<var 1D /var>!
